pullRequest.title: Document and reorder classpath config
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR do?
Change order of configuration sources and document all supported options.
As a bonus, there are a few minor tweaks to the documentation.
Checklist

 I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works >> testing manually for now
 New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
 I have updated CHANGELOG.asciidoc
I have updated supported-technologies.asciidoc
Added an API method or config option? Document in which version this will be introduced
Added an instrumentation plugin? How did you make sure that old, non-supported versions are not instrumented by accident?

Author's Checklist

 manually test most configuration priorities

Related issues

Closes #959

nodes.bodyText:
I think we could do a better job of flagging which configuration sources allow dynamic changes. Maybe we could use asciidoc footnotes for that.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            . {apm-app-ref}/agent-configuration.html[Central configuration]
          
          
            
            . `elasticapm.properties` file, by default in the same directory the agent jar. +
          
          
            
            . {apm-app-ref}/agent-configuration.html[Central configuration] footnote:dynamic[Configuration options marked with Dynamic true can be changed at runtime with this configuration source]
          
          
            
            . `elasticapm.properties` file footnote:dynamic[], by default in the same directory the agent jar. +
          
      
    
    
  

disclaimer: I've never used footnotes before and have not tested this renders properly
